items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system that suggests relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user interactions within 5 seconds.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
Recommendations are personalized per user and not generic.
non_functional: Recommendations must load within 2 seconds on average.
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: User input was high-level; assumed requirement is for a personalized recommendation feature integrated into an e-commerce platform. Specific AI model type and data sources to be determined.
